# Questão 1

## a) {.smaller}

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dados <- tibble(foreign::read.dta("toenail.dta"))
ajuste_gee <-geeglm(y ~ trt * month - trt,family = binomial(link = "logit"),
                    data = dados,id = id,corstr = "exchangeable")
```
## b)

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
exp(ajuste_gee$coefficients)

```
